title: Zaiin rawn hril la ka hnenah
lyrics:
Zaiin rawn hril la ka hnenah,
Nunna thu mak tak chu;
A mawina lo hmu zual ila,
Nunna thu mak tak chu;
Nunna thu mawi tak chu,
Rin dan min zirtir la.

Thu mawi tak chu, thu mak tak chu,
Nunna thu mak tak chu.

Kristan mi tinreng a lo hlan,
Nunna thu mak tak chu;
Mi sual, a aw nem koh ngai la,
Nunna thu mak tak chu,
A thlawna pek a ni,
Vana kal thei turin.

A thang mawi mang e, Chanchin Tha,
Nunna thu mak tak chu;
Mi tin a hlan e, muanna tha,
Nunna thu mak tak chu,
Isua chauh Chhandamtu,

Min tithianghlim fotu.
